bibl.title: Dioscorus of Oxyrhynchus and his Correspondence (P. Oxy. LV 3820).
bibl.note: The letter P. Oxy. LV, 3820, mentions a number of well-known people, including the prefect Flavius Philagrius. Considerations on the religious situation in Egypt during the fourth century.
Frend W.H.C., Dioscorus of Oxyrhynchus and his Correspondence (P. Oxy. LV 3820).
